question:
The constitutional functionaries, which are not dependent on the pleasure of the president include:
  1. Supreme Court as well as High Court judges
  2. Comptroller & Auditor General of India
  3. Chief Election Commissioner
  4. UPSC Chairman
  5. UPSC Members
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The tenure of the Supreme Court judges [Article 124], High Court judges [Article 218], Auditor General of India [Article 148(2)], Chief Election Commissioner [Article 324], and the chairman and members of the Public Service Commission [Article 317] are not dependent on the pleasure of the president or the governor, as the case may be. These posts are expressly excluded from the operation of the doctrine of pleasure.
